SELECT OD_SHR_ITEM.OD_SHR_ITEM_ID , OD_SHR_ITEM.OD_SHR_ID , OD_SHR_ITEM.MS_ITEM_SBT_ID , MS_ITEM_SBT.ITEM_SBT_NAME as MS_ITEM_SBT_NAME, OD_SHR_ITEM.HEADER , OD_SHR_ITEM.ITEM_NAME , OD_SHR_ITEM.BIKOU , OD_SHR_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , OD_SHR_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , OD_SHR_ITEM.DATA_NO , OD_SHR_ITEM.USER_KEY , OD_SHR_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , OD_SHR_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_SHR_ITEM.TS , OD_SHR_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG , OD_SHR_ITEM.SHOW_ORDER , OD_SHR_ITEM.OD_JRY_ITEM_ID FROM OD_SHR_ITEM LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_ITEM_SBT ON MS_ITEM_SBT.MS_ITEM_SBT_ID = OD_SHR_ITEM.MS_ITEM_SBT_ID
WHERE OD_SHR_ITEM.CANCEL_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO OD_SHR_ITEM ( OD_SHR_ITEM_ID , OD_SHR_ID , MS_ITEM_SBT_ID , HEADER , ITEM_NAME , BIKOU , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS , CANCEL_FLAG , SHOW_ORDER , OD_JRY_ITEM_ID ) VALUES ( :OD_SHR_ITEM_ID , :OD_SHR_ID , :MS_ITEM_SBT_ID , :HEADER , :ITEM_NAME , :BIKOU , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS , :CANCEL_FLAG , :SHOW_ORDER , :OD_JRY_ITEM_ID )

UPDATE OD_SHR_ITEM SET OD_SHR_ID = :OD_SHR_ID , MS_ITEM_SBT_ID = :MS_ITEM_SBT_ID , HEADER = :HEADER , ITEM_NAME = :ITEM_NAME , BIKOU = :BIKOU ,
SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS , CANCEL_FLAG = :CANCEL_FLAG , SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER , OD_JRY_ITEM_ID = :OD_JRY_ITEM_ID
WHERE OD_SHR_ITEM_ID = :OD_SHR_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS
